dct_title_s: Der gantze welt-kreis in seinen zwey grossen begriffen als 1 dem neueren und 2 dem alteren war innen der erste meridian nach Hollandischer art gezogen
dct_alternative_sm: Der gantze welt-kreis in seinen zwey grossen begriffen als 1 dem neueren und 2 dem alterenwar innen der erste meridian nach Frantzosischer art gezogen
dct_description_sm: Set of two maps comparing the world as represented by Dutch and French cartographers.
California shown as an unlabeled island with a flat northern coast.
Title in decorative cartouche at top. Banner over each hemisphere and projection.
North and South pole views, each 2.4 cm in diameter.
Issued in his Atlas curieux, oder neuer und compendieuser atlas... 1704?.
Possibly issued in his Totius Terrarum Orbis... 1682.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
